title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007) [Ghost]
description:
MOVIE INFORMATION
_________________

Title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
Year: 2007
IMDb rating: 7.4
Director: Tim Burton
Genre: Drama/Horror/Musical/Thriller
Featuring Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Alan Rickman
Description: The infamous story of Benjamin Barker, a.k.a. Sweeney Todd, who sets up a barber shop down in London which is the basis for a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett. Based on the hit Broadway musical.


PRODUCT
_______

Format: DVD
Edition: Theatrical Edition, 111 minutes (according to box), Dutch retail 2008
Spoken Language: English
Subtitle Language: English
Subtitles taken from DVD, converted to Subrip format with OCR in SubtitleEdit. Minor interpunction and italic corrections made, but mostly intact.
Final size: 667MB (638MB video, 38.6MB audio)


CODECS AND CHANNELS
___________________

Video Codec: H264 - MPEG-4 AVC
Resolution: 720x576
Framerate: 25fps
Average Bitrate: 800kbps
Preprocessing with AviSynth script, to auto-crop, convert to YV12 and sharpen.
Encoded with x264: program --preset placebo --tune film --pass 2 --bitrate 800 --stats ".stats" --deblock -3:-1 --rc-lookahead 250 --merange 64 --output "output" "input"

Audio Codec: AAC-HE
Channels: Stereo
Sample rate: 48000Hz
Bitrate: 48kbps
Encoded with Q-AAC (iTunes engine)

Subtitles: Subrip
Source: DVD Retail
Slightly modified:
 - Minor interpunction and italic corrections.
